data.apiNameCn: 国内按PNR的运价计算（存储）
data.introduce: 国内按PNR的运价计算（存储）服务主要是根据客户PNR进行国内运价自动计算以及将运价信息录入PNR中。
data.business:
国内运价自动计算（对应主机的PAT:A指令）和运价信息录入PNR（对应主机的SFC指令）。
1.在PAT:A 中节点@SeqenceType表示回显的价格排序方式 ，@PriceAmount为PAT 回显的条数
data.functions:
该服务支持的功能范围如下：
1. 成人运价自动计算+运价信息录入PNR
2. 儿童运价自动计算+运价信息录入PNR
3. 婴儿运价自动计算+运价信息录入PNR
4. 伤残军人运价自动计算+运价信息录入PNR
5. 因公致伤警察运价自动计算+运价信息录入PNR
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空运价计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfoSummary","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"AirTravelerAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息， 指定旅客类 型、数量等","children":[{"name":"PassengerTypeQuantity","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"乘客类型、 数量信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码：如：9901075","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirTraveler","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"乘客信息","children":[{"name":"TravelerRefNumber","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客引用 序号","children":[{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客标识， 可标识旅客 在PNR中 的序号：如果不是成人旅客， 必须输入旅客序号， 格式：数字，在0-9之间","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"PaymentDetail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"支付信息","children":[{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"支付类型：该类型为枚举，具 体的定义见下面的 说明。 目前只支持： CASH（现金） CREDIT_CARD（信用卡） 两种方式。","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FlightReference","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"基础运价信息：可以指定基础运价","children":[{"name":"@FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价基础代码","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightRefNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段序号","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Pnr号信息","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"公司代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号 格式：数字或字母5 位或者6位，例： JDD8L1","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TransactionIdentifier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"指令类型","children":[]},{"name":"@FareRefRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"当TransactionIdentifier为SFC时，表示选择要存储运价的RPH","children":[]},{"name":"@SeqenceType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PAT回显价格条数方式（H：由高到低；L:由低到高）","children":[]},{"name":"@PriceAmount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"显示价格的条数","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirPriceRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空运价计算响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告详细 信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PricedItineraries","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价行程 信息集合","children":[{"name":"PricedItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价行程 信息","children":[{"name":"AirItineraryPricingInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价信息","children":[{"name":"ItinTotalFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"总价信息","children":[{"name":"BaseFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"基本票价","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"Taxes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息集合","children":[{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCodes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础 信息集合","children":[{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础 信息代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"标识","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？错误信息：？","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ TransactionIdentifier="PAT" >
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="PEK099" />
	</POS>
	<TravelerInfoSummary>
		<AirTravelerAvail>
			<PassengerTypeQuantity Code="CHD" />
                        <AirTraveler>
                           <TravelerRefNumber RPH="1" />
                        </AirTraveler>
		</AirTravelerAvail>
		<PaymentDetail PaymentType="CASH" />
	</TravelerInfoSummary>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="HR2D9K" />
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
 <PricedItineraries>
  <PricedItinerary>
   <AirItineraryPricingInfo>
    <ItinTotalFare RPH="1">
     <BaseFare Amount="780" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
     <Taxes>
      <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="0" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
      <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="70" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
     </Taxes>
     <FareBasisCodes>
      <FareBasisCode>YCH</FareBasisCode>
     </FareBasisCodes>
    </ItinTotalFare>
   </AirItineraryPricingInfo>
  </PricedItinerary>
 </PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 带大客户编码（运价计算+存储）.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ TransactionIdentifier="PAT">
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187"/>
	</POS>
	<TravelerInfoSummary>
		<AirTravelerAvail>
			<PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT"/>
			<AirTraveler>
				<TravelerRefNumber RPH="1"/>
			</AirTraveler>
		</AirTravelerAvail>
		<PaymentDetail PaymentType="CREDIT_CARD"/>
	</TravelerInfoSummary>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="HPWWB9">
		<CompanyName Code="9901075"/>
	</BookingReferenceID>
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
	<PricedItineraries>
		<PricedItinerary>
			<AirItineraryPricingInfo>
				<ItinTotalFare RPH="1">
					<BaseFare Amount="1130" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<FareBasisCodes>
						<FareBasisCode>Y</FareBasisCode>
					</FareBasisCodes>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<ItinTotalFare RPH="2">
					<BaseFare Amount="100" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<FareBasisCodes>
						<FareBasisCode>Y</FareBasisCode>
					</FareBasisCodes>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<ItinTotalFare RPH="3">
					<BaseFare Amount="400" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<FareBasisCodes>
						<FareBasisCode>YY</FareBasisCode>
					</FareBasisCodes>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<ItinTotalFare RPH="4">
					<BaseFare Amount="500" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<FareBasisCodes>
						<FareBasisCode>ZLOWKZH</FareBasisCode>
					</FareBasisCodes>
				</ItinTotalFare>
				<ItinTotalFare RPH="5">
					<BaseFare Amount="780" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					<Taxes>
						<Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
						<Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
					</Taxes>
					<FareBasisCodes>
						<FareBasisCode>YAB2</FareBasisCode>
					</FareBasisCodes>
				</ItinTotalFare>
			</AirItineraryPricingInfo>
		</PricedItinerary>
	</PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 多个成人 PNR（只对其中一个旅客进行运价存储）
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<OTA_AirPriceRQ TransactionIdentifier="SFC" FareRefRPH="1">
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="bjs187" />
	</POS>
	<TravelerInfoSummary>
		<AirTravelerAvail>
			<PassengerTypeQuantity Code="ADT" />
                        <AirTraveler>
                             <TravelerRefNumber RPH="1" />
                        </AirTraveler>
		</AirTravelerAvail>
		<PaymentDetail PaymentType="CASH" />
	</TravelerInfoSummary>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="HPGHJ7" />
</OTA_AirPriceRQ>
qaApiDemos.response:
<OTA_AirPriceRS>
 <PricedItineraries>
  <PricedItinerary>
   <AirItineraryPricingInfo>
    <ItinTotalFare RPH="1">
     <BaseFare Amount="1560" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
     <Taxes>
      <Tax TaxCode="CN" Amount="50" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
      <Tax TaxCode="YQ" Amount="140" CurrencyCode="CNY"/>
     </Taxes>
     <FareBasisCodes>
      <FareBasisCode>Y</FareBasisCode>
     </FareBasisCodes>
    </ItinTotalFare>
   </AirItineraryPricingInfo>
  </PricedItinerary>
 </PricedItineraries>
</OTA_AirPriceRS>
